name: Sakif Azwad
description: With over 10 years of experience in event planning, Sarah is the creative visionary behind Raf Events. She brings a keen eye for detail and a passion for making dreams come true.

name: Saniad Faruque
description: Michael is our go-to guy for transforming event spaces into works of art. He has an innate talent for crafting beautiful and unique decor that leaves a lasting impression.

name: Sakib Uddin
description: Emily ensures that our clients' needs are met every step of the way. She's a dedicated professional who makes sure your vision becomes a reality.

name: Muntasir Mahmud
description: David keeps the logistics of every event running smoothly. His meticulous planning and attention to detail ensure that everything goes off without a hitch.
